about_the_game:
This is the demo of Feed The Gods that you can play for free.



Enter a chaotic party tabletop game where you and your friends forge your way using powerful cards. Escape the pit of doom and leave rival cultists to be devoured by the ravenous Hungry Ancient Deity.

  • You take a role of a cult leader. In each session, the cult is given out randomly
  • Your prodigal minion needs to stay on top! Beware, you are not the only one in this challenge
  • Use cards to help your loyal worshiper survive the turmoil. Send other players' minions to their doom at the bottom of the pit
  • Just be respectful! And keep your cult a secret to everyone...

And don't forget to FEED THE GODS with your enemies. Or something horrible will happen...

name: Feed The Gods Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 | AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 6700K | Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 | AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Feed The Gods Demo is a casual card battler for 2-4 players. With powerful random cards you have to escape the pit of doom and leave your opponents at the bottom as a sacrifice to the gods. Take the lead of one of the cultist’s member, use your cards wisely, cheat, lie and stay on top!
